definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Jon 2:6 reeds, rushes (coll.) (prob. loan-word from Egypt. ṭwfi, reeds, Steindorff:BAS i. 603 Erman:ZMG xivi (1892), 122; Semitic acc. to WMM:As.u.Eur. 101);—
rushes, in Nile Ex 2:3, Ex 2:5 (E); [[קָנֶה וׇסוּף]] Is 19:6 (of Egypt).
usu. in combin. [[יַם־סוּף]] prob. = sea of rushes or reeds ( > sea of (city) Suph), which Gk. incl. in wider name qa/lassa E)ruqra),

definitions.title: Red Sea
definitions.body: (cf. Di:Ex 13:18 and esp. WMM:As. u. Eur. 42f., who expl. as name orig. given to upper end of Gulf of Suez, extending into Bitter Lakes, shallow and marshy, whence reeds (prob. also reddish colour));—name applied only to arms of Red Sea; most oft.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: sts. to Gulf of Akaba 1Ki 9:26, and [[דֶּרֶךְ יַם־סוּף]] Nu 21:4 (E), prob. also Nu 14:25 (E), De 1:40, De 2:1; perh. Ju Jdg 11:16, Je 49:21; poss. rd. [[מִיַּם־סוּף]] for ´[[מוֹל ס]] De 1:1 (v. infor.).
